description:
I was happy to find a native fitness tracker made for GNOME. Linking the app to my Google account was done in a minute - data synced in wonderfully.

When I opened the app again the next day, everything on the dashboard was reset to zero. Makes sense, seeing as it was a new day. Problem is, I can't find any kind of activity log, nor any timeline. 

A fitness app without a timeline or activity log is basically useless. I hope this feature can be added, since the idea of a native fitness tracker for GNOME is great.

It's great to have a health application that actually targets humans and not the health of computers.

I don't have a smartphone or a smartwatch, but I'm interested to see the progress that I do for losing weight. For that task, this application works well, and shows recommendations based on my height (with the BMI measure), and shows a graph.
summary: Works well for keeping track of the weight

description: Health is supposed to sync with Google Fit. It can create the connection but doesn't actually sync. Useful if you want to manually add information. I wanted to follow my health/fitness tracking in an app so it failed at that purpose.
It's so easy to use as all GNOME apps.
Great application, syncs wonderfully with Google Fitness. Especially useful now Google has shut down their website for Fitness for some bizarre reason.
summary: Great application, works well with Google Fitness

description: A method for importing external data automatically (esp., from FOSS Android apps like Medilog or Gadgetbridge) without having to rely google (or any other big Tech company).
summary: Great idea but not at all practical

description: Cogitri & contributors have put a lot of work into making a good, basic health app. Works well on mobile, but not marked in flathub yet as such. Crashes upon opening on my Librem 5, but no issues on Pinephone or desktop
summary: Covers the Basics, Lots of Potential

description: Not even able to submit bug report. No idea what's going wrong on a fresh install/update.
summary: Immediate crash on Fedora 38, fully up to date system

description: se instala pero no abre, tengo ubuntu 23.04
Tres simple suivi de poids et de marche qui peut se connecter à google fit
Ne fonctionne pas sous Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS.
summary: Ne fonctionne pas sous Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS
